moves.1. d4: d4... i don't like that movement, prefer e4..
moves.4... Bf5: I'm trying to develop all my pieces....
moves.6. O-O Bd6: Well i'm doing well so far....
moves.9. Qe2 Bg4: i didn't know what else to play.......
moves.11... Bf5 12. e4: e4 to push the bishop....Now it's my fault and i have to choose...If i'd go Bg6 then he 'd play e5! ... So i decided to take the pawn....
moves.12... Bxe4 13. Nxe4 Nxe4 14. Qxe4: Now i'm a bishop down...Not too good!
moves.14... f5: Now i had to make a plan for the game....
moves.17... Nf4: I was trying to develop my the knight....So far i'm doing so good....
moves.19. Bxh7 Qf6: I have a plan in mind though he keeps doing whatever he wants.... -5 down still....
moves.20... Rae8: I put the roock in a good position...
moves.22... Qg6: I had a plan to exchange our queens but he denied...
moves.23. Be4 Qf6: Put it in a safer square..
moves.25... Qf4: Push the roock and then the king....
moves.26... Rxe4: Time to equal the missing bishop... Now the game is almost equal...
moves.29. Ng5: THe worst movement in the game....Now i know he's lost... Fortunately though i made an early mistake i equalize and i have the upper hand...
moves.31... Qxf2#: And now is on the queen's mercy!!!!! Hope you like it...wait for comment and ratings...
